clean_drawer_interior.description: Clean the interior part of a opened drawer.

organize_drawer.description: Organize the items inside the opened drawer.

secure_drawer.description: Secure the opened drawer by sliding it back into the table.

clean_opened_drawer.description: Clean the inside of the opened drawer

close_drawer_after_usage.description: After using, close the opened drawer.

slide_drawer_close.description: Slide the opened drawer into closed position.

arrange_opened_drawer.description: Rearrange the items in the opened drawer.

close_drawer.description: Slide the opened drawer into the closed position.

remove_item.description: Pick up an item from the opened drawer.

place_item.description: Place an item into the opened drawer.

clean_slider_of_drawer.description: Clean the slider of the opened drawer to ensure smooth sliding.

push_drawer.description: After using, push the opened drawer to close it.

swap_items.description: Swap the position of two items in the opened drawer.

retrieve_items.description: Retrieve all items from the opened drawer.

refill_drawer.description: Refill the opened drawer with items.

initiate_drawer_usage.description: For using the drawer, slide the drawer out of the table.

clean_drawer.description: Clean the outside of the closed drawer to ensure it's neat.

collect_item_from_drawer.description: Collect item from closed drawer by sliding it open, picking the item and sliding it close.

maintain_drawer.description: Maintain the drawer in the closed state as needed.

open_drawer_for_usage.description: Open the closed drawer for use.

clean_closed_drawer_exterior.description: Clean the exterior of the closed drawer

retrieve_item_from_drawer.description: Slide open the drawer, pick an item and close the drawer.

pull_drawer.description: Slide out the closed drawer to open it.

maintain_drawer_closed.description: The drawer is already closed. Maintain this status.

pull_drawer_for_usage.description: Pull the closed drawer to open it for usage.

wipe_drawer.description: Wipe the front of the closed drawer to clean it.

retrieve_from_and_close_drawer.description: Retrieve an item from the drawer and then close it.

clean_table.description: To remove any dirt or dust, clean the table's top surface.

clean_table_&_drawer.description: Clean the furniture body and the outside of the drawer.

press_table_surface.description: To check stability, apply pressure on the table surface.

apply_pressure_on_table.description: Apply pressure on the table surface.

clean_table_face.description: Clean the most visible part of the furniture body.

wipe_table.description: Clean the table including its surface and the exterior of the drawer.

press_table.description: Apply pressure on the table surface.

clean_table_body.description: Wipe the surface of the table body to make it clean.

clean_entire_table.description: Clean the entire table including the opened or closed drawer and the table body.

clean_table_surface.description: Clean the surface of the table.

clean_whole_table.description: Clean the entire table including the drawer either opened or closed and the table surface.

surface_maintenance.description: Maintain the surface of the table by applying pressure and then cleaning it.

wipe_entire_table.description: Wipe the entire table including the drawer's exterior.

rearrange_drawers_and_clean_table.description: Ensure a clean table with organized drawers which involves cleaning table, organizing the opened drawer, closing it and cleaning the outside of the drawer.

maintain_and_clean_table.description: Maintain a clean and neat table by cleaning it completely and ensuring the closed drawers remain closed.

clean_table_and_arrange_drawers.description: Clean the entire table including opened or closed drawer and arrange the items in the drawers.

clean_and_arrange.description: Wipe the entire table, arrange the items in the opened drawer and closes the drawer.

retrieve_and_clean.description: Retrieves an item from the closed drawer, cleans the table including its surface and exteriors of the drawer.
